author: Zelyonii_Zaktan
title: It's really worst LEGO game ever!
review:
Only title tell you what I think. Boring and bad game, same as LSW. It have not even funny movies as LSW or LIJ. 
Pros
- Sacts about BATMAN world.
- Some interesting ideas/
CONS
- BAD AND BORING!
- Enemies are silly, but you need much time to kill them.
- Stupid levels.
My poor money...

author: decc
title: winner
review:
while this game can be silly to some people, I think it was cool, fun to play, I just didn´like that you don´t have a life´s metter or something  that can tell you "game over" I mean,  it is so easy to win, (I already got 100%) I would like it to be more difficult, I mean that you only have three continues or something like that. 

And I´m wondering if it is going to be a second part of it, since in the last item you pick  says "the end?"

author: TheFadedTBCap
title: Awesome Video Game
review:
This game is awesome!  The game has three great stories about Batman and Robin fighting their archenemies.  Then you can play the same three stories from the villains point of view.

Pros:
Three awesome stories to play
Can play from the villains side
About 50 available characters
Can replay levels to collect minikits from both the heroes and villains side
Can buy vehicles to play in certain levels
Can buy facts about Batman
Can buy upgrades to gadgets and other things
Can explore the Batcave and Arkham Asylum
Make your own character (similar to Indiana Jones)
Batarang works really well

Cons:
Doesn't have split screen like newer games

Overall, I give it a 10/10.  I recommend this video game to anyone.
